txt.en: Return to the Temámir Guard Amarêkh in Mekab-kuphâr in southern Khabârkhad.

Amarêkh, one of the Temámir guards stationed in Mekab-kuphâr, has asked you to leave offerings of food for the \qlittle spirits\q throughout Khabârkhad. \n\nThe first location is west of Mekab-kuphâr, near Sektakhâb, where the Dead walk.
Amarêkh, one of the Temámir guards stationed in Mekab-kuphâr, has asked you to leave offerings of food for the \qlittle spirits\q throughout Khabârkhad.
'Thank you. I know it seems strange, but I really do think the food helps. And anyway, someone is eating a little better because of us.'
The second location is north of Mekab-kuphâr, near Nishabêt, home of monstrous spiders.
Return to the Temámir Guard Amarêkh in Mekab-kuphâr

'Could I have a moment of your time? I have a bit of a problem.'

The guard seems reticent to share her secret.

'It's, well, promise you won't laugh, will you?'

She leans in close to whisper something to you.

'It's the little spirits. Spirits of the dead. They've been coming after our patrols, throwing stones at our helmets, knocking our legs when we're not looking. It's bad for morale. Some of the guards are scared to patrol now, for fear the spirits will get more violent and do worse.

'I've been leaving food for them, little offerings over the past few weeks. It seems to have mollified them. But now I've been stationed here and I'm not to leave or go on patrols for a fortnight or more. I'm worried the spirits will start growing agitated. Could you leave food for them, in my stead?

'I know it seems a mite odd, but things have gotten more peaceful in the past few weeks. I can mark the locations down for you. Can you help?'
The third location is north-west of Mekab-kuphâr, near Lôkhalel, where tomb robbers keep their council.
